virtual ifpf::IHotfolderProcessingInfo* ifpf::CHotfolderWorkflowComp::AddHotfolder ( const istd::CString &  hotfolderName,
const istd::CString &  hotfolderId = istd::CString() 
) [virtual]

Add a hotfolder to the workflow.

The name of the hotfolder must be unique, otherwise no folder will be added an the function returns null.

Implements ifpf::IHotfolderWorkflow.
